game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is torn apart by cataclysmic events known as 'The Great Deviations.' Players take on the role of a temporal archaeologist tasked with unraveling the mysteries behind these distortions. As they journey through ancient ruins and mystical realms, they discover that each deviation has created alternate timelines, threatening the very existence of the universe.
game.beginning: In the world's last city, Chronos, the player receives a cryptic message from an unknown ally warning of an imminent Great Deviation. The city is suddenly ravaged by temporal energies, and the player must flee to the ancient ruins of Eldrador to uncover the secrets behind the impending catastrophe.
game.ending: As the player repairs the timestream, they realize that each alternate timeline holds a piece of the original universe's essence. With all Great Deviations resolved, the timelines merge, restoring balance to the fabric of reality. However, in doing so, the player becomes lost in the newly formed timeline, leaving behind only cryptic whispers of their existence.
